author: Brenton Clark
text: I've had an ICMA "intern" membership for the past several months, and fairly soon I'll be leaving my internships. It looks like most likely I will end up at a state-level job. I know that ICMA has a membership option for state/federal employees, and just wondered if there is anyone who has gone between local government and state/federal and what benefits they felt staying with ICMA during that transition gave them?
title: Membership While a State-Level Worker
